description: This file defines a React functional component for the events page of a frontend application. It handles fetching and displaying a list of events, opening event details, and submitting RSVP responses. It integrates with external API functions and uses components for event cards and modals.

methods.name: fetchEvents
methods.description: Fetches the list of events based on the search query and updates the state.

methods.name: openEvent
methods.description: Opens the details for a selected event, fetching attendees.

methods.name: onRsvp
methods.description: Submits an RSVP response for the selected event.
